title: Vote the champion who gets rewarded the most for doing nothing whole game
body:
Here are my candidates:

*Pyke: it doesn't matter if the opponent support plays every fight and skirmish very well, peels, engages whatever, you let your team do everything, then you just press R when someone is low and collect the reward

*Veigar: stand back, last hit with Q and stack damage; in teamfights put the cage down, let your team do the job, press R on whoever you hate the most

*Nasus: on the same token as Veigar, you become a monster just by interacting with minions half of the time

*Karthus: LMAO, amazing jungle clear, can kill someone from across the map, can kill someone with his passive, even after he messed up and died

replies.body:
I don't really agree with Pyke, because he actually requires quite a deal of skill to play well. His ultimate does have a very low skill floor considering how highly rewarding it is, but usually he has to play well to set up his team in order for him to be able to make good use of it. 

I think the rest of your list is accurate, but I'd definitely add Nunu on there. Nunu is likely the best AFK Jungle in the game, all he does is farm stuff and turns into a nearly unkillable tank that gives his team free attack speed, movement speed, crowd control, and near guaranteed objective control when played well. All of that for literally doing nothing but farming in his Jungle until he has a few items. 

The others are pretty busted too in their own right, Nasus gets tons of damage, Karthus is pretty much the same as Nunu (AFK farms into a monster), and Veigar scales no matter how much he feeds.

I mean when you write it out like this, any champions seems dumb, watch. Nautilus: Throw out a hook with a broken hit box on a short CD and if you miss somehow, doesn't matter, point and click multiple target can't be escaped knock up.

>
> I mean when you write it out like this, any champions seems dumb, watch. Nautilus: Throw out a hook with a broken hit box on a short CD and if you miss somehow, doesn't matter, point and click multiple target can't be escaped knock up.

You didn't pay attention to my choices, just straight up came here to show me I am wrong. You did the same in one my previous threads.

You could at least have said Garen, since he can be 0/10 and still kill people with his point and click no scaling execute ULT.

Don't compare an utility tank like Naut, who CCes people without killing them with Pyke, who can be behind and still rack up kills because of his team.

> [{quoted}](name=ContDeCaterinca1,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uiqYfisE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-05T11:06:46.992+0000)

> You didn't pay attention to my choices, just straight up came here to show me I am wrong. You did the same in one my previous threads.

You mean your incredibly bias choices of champions you hate but have likely never played so you hate them without understanding their nuances or problems they have?

> You could at least have said Garen, since he can be 0/10 and still kill people with his no point and click no scaling ULT. 

If you die to a 0/10 Garen, you are actually terrible at the game or played so stupidly poorly that he deserves to kill you.

> Don't compare an utility tank like Naut, who CCes people without killing them with Pyke, who can be behind and still rack up kills because of his team.

Nautilus doesn’t kill people, lol. There is a reason he has a higher pick ban and play rate at all elos.

> [{quoted}](name=Jamaree,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uiqYfisE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-05T11:15:24.797+0000)
>
> You mean your incredibly bias choices of champions you hate but have likely never played so you hate them without understanding their nuances or problems they have?
>

Again, I left the list open for suggestion, you added none. You are totally off topic here buddy, literally attacking my thread with no contribution.
I said who is rewarded "the most", which means there is a degree of reward that other champions don't have, not that you can feed all match and still be rewarded.

> If you die to a 0/10 Garen, you are actually terrible at the game or played so stupidly poorly that he deserves to kill you.

Even if he is super fed or way behind his ULT still does exact same damage. I have managed to get 24 kills streak on Garen once from being down 2-5, my biggest killstreak to date, he is pretty good at coming back from behind.
 
> Nautilus doesn’t kill people, lol. There is a reason he has a higher pick ban and play rate at all elos.

He doesn't when behind, his early game is strong, then he falls of like most supports.

{{champion:17}}. Win his lane, lose his lane, doesn't matter. He isn't going to participate in a teamfight.
Literally all he brings his team is waveclear, and his lane is ungankable, which means more pressure from the jungler on every other lane.
He wins simply by cockblocking his top lane opponent, stalling seiges and hoping his team gets ahead and wins the game for him in lanes where he isn't.
Yasuo. Go 0/4 in lane? Doesn’t matter. Get your 2 item spike and suddenly it’s like you went 7/4 cause you just got 2000 gold of free stats. Yaaaaay

To be fair, maybe Pyke's hitbox should be a thinner X. But he has such a massive detriment in terms of build possibilities that he just can't make much of it even when he gets kills. 

Stacking has always been an unreasonable thing to have in a game where the length is determined by the skill of the team as a team, so you've got that on Veigar and Nasus. I think it'd work better if it worked like HoTS, where they had a cap and/or intervals instead of just steady increases in strength. 

Karthus just got nerfed really hard, so, not really a problem any more.

{{champion:74}} Plops turrets down and let's the game play the game for him. Sometimes he gets to run around in circles  and push random buttons if the enemy tries to all in him. Which buttons? Doesn't matter. All of them, maybe.
The answer is Karthus. He can int all game and then press R at the right time for a pentakill.
Reworks are so braindead, that they all count.
